ai-atk-abh03a0:0_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-atk-abh03a0:1_0: if it is a reminded place;
ai-atk-abh03a0:4_0: There are eighteen in Māra’s snares,
ai-atk-abh03a0:5_0: Having taught the Great hero, the wise one (tree) between the same world,
ai-atk-abh03a0:6_0: he talked about the elements of escape.
ai-atk-abh03a0:7_0: Listen to him, I will proclaim it to him.
